author: tdelabro
content:
I followed this guide: https://notes.ethereum.org/qrDBhhydTsyKFmGaBl2COQ on how to run a node on Kiln.
I tried with Lighthouse, Prysm and Lodestar and couldn't have a single one to run. That's because the author just copy-pasted instruction out of context. When you execute the commands one after the other as prompted by the guide, you can't get a single consensus layer to run. There are inconsistencies between the actual state of my machine when I follow the guide and the command I'm prompted to execute. That make it impossible to run a Kiln node by following this guide. Which is sad, because it is the only purpose of this guide.
